title.a: Knockdown - #LosAngelesFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire 11/24/2021 INC#1235

item.description: Knockdown - #LosAngelesFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1235; 05:52PM; 128 E Washington Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3D2dW3f; Historic South Central; Address Remains Tentative. 116 LAFD Firefighters took just 26 minutes in offensive operations to extinguish the bulk of flame in a 150' x 200' two story strip mall. Smoldering fire remains in the parts of the building that experienced structural collapse. No injury. #LATraffic: Washington Boulevard, including the adjacent Metro A (Blue) Line Light Rail Line will remain closed to all vehicle and train traffic until LAFD operations are complete, unknown duration. Motorists, expect congestion and delay, avoid the immediate area and consider an alternate route. Detours are readily available. Monitor traffic reports on news radio. Transit Users: Follow @MetroLAAlerts https://twitter.com/MetroLAAlerts on Twitter for information. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC18 BC5 CM22 E10 E11 E14 E15 E17 E2 E203 E210 E211 E215 E220 E227 E27 E29 E9 EA1 EM1 EM11 EM9 HR3 RA10 RA11 RA209 RA809 RA810 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T20 T27 T3 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 12 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Multi-Patient Traffic Collision; INC#1228; 05:24PM; SB 5 Fwy x Roxford St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3xjhvAC; Granada Hills; PRELIM: LAFD with LACoFD in Automatic Aid to multi-vehicle traffic collision with at least five patients, two of whom are children. One or more may have been ejected in the collision. No initial reports of entrapment. No further details. Media Inquiries: CHP Newhall Log #2464; FS 91; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC12 CM42 E275 E287 E298 E75 E87 E90 E91 EM14 EM15 EM17 RA18 RA75 RA77 RA81 RA87 RA91 T75 T87 T98 + LACoFD; CH8; 17 18; Brian Humphrey

title.a: Update Greater Alarm Structure Fire #LosAngelesFire 11/24/2021 INC#1235

item.description: Update #LosAngelesFire Greater Alarm Structure Fire; INC#1235; 05:42PM; 128 E Washington Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3D2dW3f; Historic South Central; With 83 LAFD Firefighters now assigned in offensive operations, this fire, formally known as the #LosAngelesFire (name of cross street) has escalated to Greater Alarm status. Heavy fire on the first floor of this 50' x 200' two story strip mall is threatening to extend intot the second floor. ; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 BC5 CM22 E10 E14 E15 E210 E211 E215 E227 E27 E29 E9 EM1 EM11 HR3 RA10 RA809 RA810 SQ21 T10 T11 T15 T27 T9 UR27 UR88; CH9; 12 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#1235; 05:26PM; 128 E Washington Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3D2dW3f; Historic South Central; PRELIM: 150' x 200' two story strip mall with fire in one unit on the first floor.; FS 10; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 9; BC1 BC11 BC13 CM22 E10 E14 E15 E210 E215 E9 EM1 RA10 RA809 RA810 SQ21 T10 T15 T9; CH9; 12; Brian Humphrey

Update Rescue; INC#0385; 09:44AM; 984 N Bel Air Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cMLY0p; Bel Air; The 22 year old male (still undetermined site affiliation) was on a steep hillside in a residential neighborhood where brush clearance was being performed. He fell an undetermined distance after being struck in the back by unknown size rock, and has a non-life threatening leg injury and back pain. The LAFD rescue helicopter has safely hoisted him aboard for inflight care during direct transport to an area hospital.; FS 71; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; AO2 BC5 BC9 E237 E27 E288 E71 E90 EM9 H1 H4 HA1 HA4 HR3 RA71 RA827 RH114 T37 T88 UR88; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Rescue; INC#0385; 08:28AM; 984 N Bel Air Rd; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cMLY0p; Bel Air; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to an adult male reportedly performing brush clearance (unknown if resident or contractor), approximately 200' down a steep hillside, when he was apparently struck in the back by unknown size rock, and has a non-life threatening leg injury. First arriving LAFD personnel have established a two line rope system, are at the patient's side, requesting an LAFD helicopter for a hoist rescue with direct transport to an area hospital.; FS 71; Batt 9; West Bureau; Council District 5; AO2 BC5 BC9 E237 E27 E288 E71 E90 EM9 H1 H4 HA1 HA4 HR3 RA71 RA827 T37 T88 UR88; CH7; 12; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Brush Fire; INC#0603; 11:57AM; EB 134 Fwy x 2 Fwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/2SZp8wx; Eagle Rock; 52 LAFD Firefighters, working alongside Glendale and L.A. County Firefighters, took just 48 minutes to extinguish two acres acres of vegetation burning in four areas 150 yards apart, near the Glendale / City of Los Angeles border (EB 134 east of Harvey Drive), north of the CHP Communications Center, which was not directly impacted by the fire. No injury. No structures threatened or damaged. No evacuation. Fire cause under investigation. No details currently available about the nearby traffic collision on the 134 Freeway, or its relationship to the fire.; FS 42; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; AO1 AO2 BC1 BC2 E1 E12 E201 E212 E250 E35 E42 E55 E90 EM1 H1 H2 H3 HA1 HA2 HA3 RA12 T1 T12 T50 + LACoFD + Glendale FD; CH5; 15; Brian Humphrey

Brush Fire; INC#0603; 11:09AM; EB 134 Fwy x 2 Fwy; MAP: https://bit.ly/2SZp8wx; Eagle Rock; PRELIM: LAFD, LACoFD and Glendale FD battling four areas of (undeclared size) vegetation burning about 150 yards apart near the Glendale / City of Los Angeles border in the vicinity of the CHP Communications Center (EB 134 east of Harvey Drive). Additional reports of a traffic collision (related? on 134 Freeway?). No imminent structure threat. No evacuation.; FS 42; Batt 2; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 BC2 E1 E201 E212 E250 E35 E42 E55 E90 EM1 H1 H2 H3 HA1 HA2 HA3 RA12 T1 T12 T50; CH5; 15; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown - Structure Fire; INC#0568; 10:59AM; 1043 S Harvard Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3cLTUio; Harvard Heights; 55 LAFD Firefighters took just 14 minutes in a well-coordinated offensive firefighting operation to confine fire within a 1,080 square foot one-story home with a converted attic. No injury. Fire cause under active investigation.; FS 26; Batt 11; Central Bureau; Council District 10; BC1 BC11 BC18 CM22 CM42 E11 E13 E20 E211 E226 E229 E26 EM1 EM13 EM9 RA11 RA13 RA26 RA52 RA826 T11 T26 T29; CH9; 14 15; Brian Humphrey
